step.cmd: Download the dataset from the Pitney Bowes eStore using the link provided in the release announcement or welcome email. You can also download the database from the technical support web site, .
The database is downloaded as a zip file. Unzip the database before proceeding with the installation.
Copy the data to any directory. Note the file name and path.

info.note: You may install datasets on a mapped drive, but performance will be affected since you will be accessing them on a network rather than accessing them locally.
